reviews.review_msg: His lectures are read straight from his powerpoints, which I found to be unhelpful and is delivered in a monotone pitch. During class discussions he will put you down in front of the class which is unprofessional and shows a lack of constructive teaching ability. In reference to the very unstructured class project do not expect helpful feedback.

He is not helpful at all. He criticizes project proposals but offer no help on what he thinks is the right track to follow. He talks too fast and I understand less than 5% of everything he says. He does not even seem to care if students understand him or not. Please avoid him.
